5.m: I delight to do your will, O my God; your law is within my heart. - Psalm 40:8 (ESV)

l.q: In Leviticus 4:27-30, what kind of animal should common people sacrifice as atonement for their sins?
l.a: The person should sacrifice a female goat without blemish.

l.q: In the Old Testament, why should people make animal offerings?
l.a: In the Old Testament, people should make animal offerings everytime they sin in order to obtain God's forgiveness.
Psalm 40:6 foretells that someone will take the place of burnt offerings and sin offerings, and God will not require them anymore.
Jesus Christ is talking in Psalm 40:7-8.

s.h:
Pleased as man with men to dwell 
 Jesus, our Emmanuel

5.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
